item.title: A magician is a...
item.description: “A magician is an actor playing the part of a magician.” — Jean Eugène Robert-Houdin. The quote This essay is dedicated to magicians. Others might find it intriguing, but it will probably be irrelevant to them. If you ask a magician to give you one famous quote about their object of study, the vast majority of them will tell you that Jean Eugène Robert-Houdin once said “A magician is an actor playing the part of a magician.

item.title: A script about a scriptwriter
item.description: STATUS: DRAFT I believe there is an inherent lazyness to people writing about their own profession book, scriptwriter, mangaka, moviemaker i understand the attraction, thus they can speak from experience and introduce some additoinal realism and maybe the illusion that it is a true story (link fargo) obviously there are exeption, scott mccloud made a comic about making comics but it is not a comic about a comic writer, it is a comic about the theory and thinking that goes into making a comic a treaty on the subject
